chapter.title: Adding Maven support to an existing project
chapter.para: Select the project that Maven support will be added to from the Project Explorer.

textobject.phrase: Selecting Convert to Maven Project from the context menu of the chosen project.

chapter.para: Right-click on the project to bring up the context menu.
From the context menu navigate to ConfigureConvert to Maven Project.

textobject.phrase: Selecting Convert to Maven Project from the context menu of the chosen project.

chapter.para: Click on the Convert to Maven Project menu option.

A Maven POM wizard will launch. The wizard will create a pom.xml file for your project. This file will contain the projects Maven settings. All necessary fields of the wizard will be automatically filled.

textobject.phrase: The wizard to create a pom.xml file for your project.

chapter.para: It is recommended that you change the Packaging option to pom to avoid any issues in expansion of the project with Maven modules in the future.

textobject.phrase: Showing the selection of pom from the drop-down menu of the Packaging setting.

chapter.para: Once Maven support has been added to the project, a new pom.xml file will appear in the list of files for the project. This can be viewed in the Project Explorer.

textobject.phrase: The project now has a new pom.xml file, seen in the Project Explorer.

chapter.para: Double-click on the pom.xml file to view the settings associated with it. The settings here were set in the Maven POM wizard and can be edited from this Overview screen.

textobject.phrase: The Overview screen for the new pom.xml file.
